DOC.brief_summary: This is an observational, non-interventional, non-comparative, post-authorization safety study to evaluate efficacy and long-term safety of Cimzia in adult patients with RA in need of treatment with a biological product.
DOC.brief_title: Observation of Treatment With Certolizumab Pegol in Daily Practice
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to assess the clinical efficacy of Cimzia in achieving clinical remission after two years of therapy. The observational nature of the study leaves the therapeutic decision exclusively within the discretion of the treating physician.
DOC.criteria: Patients eligible for treatment with Cimzia as defined in EU approved SmPC Patient previously treated with Cimzia. Patient with known hypersensitivity to any component of Cimzia
